import { Close } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { Button, Dialog, DialogTitle, Divider, Grid, Icon, IconButton, Typography, useTheme } from "@mui/material"; function SubscribePopup ({username, nickname, type, open, setOpen}){ const theme = useTheme(); var subsList = [ { price: 10, days: 30 }, { price: 18, days: 60 }, { price: 25, days: 90 } ] return(
setOpen(false)}>
setOpen(false)}style={{padding: "0px"}}> Abbonati a {nickname} Scegli uno tra i seguenti abbonamenti, una volta selezionato potrai procedere al pagamento. {subsList.map((item) => ( ))}
) } export default SubscribePopup;
